Package froggerAnimal_Actions

Class Animal

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
froggerActors.Actor
froggerAnimal_Actions.Animal
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Animal
extends Actor
Represents the player's avatar in the game, which is a frog in Frogger Game.
It can move. It might get hit by the obstacles on the road, get eaten by monster, get bombed or drown into the river and die.
Its goal is to reach the empty End on the other side.
Animal is also an Actor.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Animal​(java.lang.String imageLink)
    This constructor will create an Animal object with its initial position in the game set.
    The Animal can now move up (W key) down (S key) left (A key) and right (D key) with different animations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void act​(long now)
    Defines how Animal will behave in the game.
    Animal can collide with other game objects and move along with them.
    Should the Animal experience any death, Animal will perform relevant actions upon its death.
    Should the Animal successfully reach the destinations, Animal will gain points.

    Sets up all the necessary animations and looks for Animal.

  • Constructor Details

    • Animal

      public Animal​(java.lang.String imageLink)
      This constructor will create an Animal object with its initial position in the game set.
      The Animal can now move up (W key) down (S key) left (A key) and right (D key) with different animations. This is done by implementing setOnKeyPressed and setOnKeyReleased to detect and handle the keyboard inputs.
      Parameters:
      imageLink - The image link for how the Animal is displayed in the game

  • Method Details

    • act

      public void act​(long now)
      Defines how Animal will behave in the game.
      Animal can collide with other game objects and move along with them.
      Should the Animal experience any death, Animal will perform relevant actions upon its death.
      Should the Animal successfully reach the destinations, Animal will gain points.
      Specified by:
      act in class Actor
      Parameters:
      now - in nanoseconds format and it represents the timestamp of the current frame.

    • changeScore

      public boolean changeScore()
      Checks if Animal score has changed.
      Returns:
      boolean true if there is a change in the Animal's score
      see changeScore

    • changeLife

      public boolean changeLife()
      Checks if Animal number of life has changed.
      Returns:
      boolean true if there is a change in the number of life
      see changeLife

    • noLife

      public boolean noLife()
      Checks if Animal has run out of life.
      Returns:
      boolean true when Animal has no more life.

    • getStop

      public boolean getStop()
      Checks if Animal has reached all the 5 destinations in a level and is stopped in the game.
      Returns:
      boolean true if Animal has reached all the destinations.

    • setPoints

      public void setPoints​(int points)
      Sets the game points of Animal.
      Parameters:
      points - the points to be assigned to the Animal.

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Gets the game points of Animal.
      Returns:
      the current points of Animal in int

      public void setLevel​(int level)

      Parameters:
      level - the game level

      Returns:
      level in int

    • setmovementX

      public void setmovementX​(double mX)
      Sets the movementX of Animal at each move.
      movementX is the horizontal moving speed of Animal.
      Parameters:
      mX - the value for movementX to be assigned with

    • getmovementX

      public double getmovementX()
      Gets the movementX of Animal at each move.
      Returns:
      horizontal movement in int

    • setmovementY

      public void setmovementY​(double mY)

    • animalAnimationSetUp

      private void animalAnimationSetUp()
      Sets up all the necessary animations and looks for Animal. Used exclusively by Animal only.
      Images for the animations are set up by using ImageGenerator
